forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain this morning, with showers continuing this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Mainly cloudy. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. More clouds than sun. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
